title: Shein's Boss Talks About His Chinese Roots
summary: The founder of Shein, a big fashion company, gave a rare speech in China. He talked about how Shein started in China and is investing a lot of money there to make clothes faster and better. Shein helps create many jobs in China. The boss said China's support is important for Shein's success. Even though Shein has moved its main office to Singapore and wants to sell shares in other countries, he still feels connected to China. This speech was shared online and in the news, which is unusual because he doesn't speak in public often. Shein sells clothes all over the world but faces some problems because of trade rules.

background_read: Shein is a fast-fashion company that makes trendy clothes quickly and sells them online. It started in China and has grown to sell in many countries. The founder, Xu Yangtian, rarely appears in public. In his speech, he talked about investing in China to improve how clothes are made and create jobs. This is important because Shein faces challenges from trade rules between countries.
Article_Structure: WHAT: He gave a rare speech in China about investing money and staying connected to China
WHY: To show Shein's roots in China and its plans to improve fashion production there

perspectives.description: Shein's boss highlights how China's support helps the company grow and create jobs.
